name: Bora Bora Smoothie Cafe - Morris Park Bronx
address: 647 Morris Park Ave, Bronx, NY 10462, USA

reviews.text: Delicious food, very nice service and a relaxed nice looking caf√©. It's great to have them in the neighborhood.

Bora is my favorite cafe in all of New York. The service is impeccable, and they always humor my odd drink customizations. It became a second home to me and my favorite study spot. I will miss it! The workers are so sweet and kind.

Amazing experience I loved it here, my friend & I enjoyed our bowls I got the coconutttt Defintely recommend this one and my friend got the mango  bowl with the goji berries

Nice cafe in the neighborhood for you to relax have a cup of coffee or smoothie or grab something to eat.
The atmosphere is great lots of seating and a bathroom.
This was a beautiful peaceful place very pretty inside my daughter was in love with her bowl everything was fresh and yummy . Thank you for your services today.

Want an authentic smoothie spot? Look no  further than Bora Bora Smoothie Cafe. With a menu full of delicious options to your taste, this place is great! The cafe is clean throughout, the smoothies taste excellent & with exceptional service from friendly staff, you won‚Äôt be disappointed. Ayad, is always attentive & welcoming guests with a smile. I visit frequently & my go-to is any power smoothie on the menu. I highly recommend this place to family & friends.
Ayad was amazing. Very sweet awesome customer service.

Excellent customer service. The best a√ßa√≠ bowl ever .
I was here on August 12th at 11:00pm Nader was super kind and helpful, so were his coworkers.

Tried this place for the first time and got the halloumi croffle. It was pretty good but salty which I'm assuming was the cheese (first time trying halloumi). The place is very cute and I would stop by again to try their drinks!

3/15/2025 Stopped by again and tried the pistachio crepe. I loved the presentation on the plate. The crepe was soft and the chocolate and pistachio sauce was great!

4/13/2025 Hawaiian pitaya bowl (small) was delicious!

Obsessed with this place üíï

Cozy spot with delightful coffee and delicious cr√™pes or waffles ü•ê‚ú® The staff were friendly and welcoming, and the atmosphere was perfect for a relaxing evening treat. Highly recommend for a tasty escape! üòä"

This place is magical. They delivery 5 star via uber. And everything is so neat and pretty and clean and customized by the restaurant and its brand. This is what I prayed for in the Bronx. PERFECTION! I can‚Äôt stop eatingggggg yall food I love it here!!!!!!
for anyone wondering THEY DO SERVE FOOD .. online is misleading seems like it‚Äôs only drinks . They have sandwiches as well. Plenty of seating. Expensive.
the crepes are super sweet so i had to take my time and eat slowly but its a beautiful cafe with great atmosphere and staff that made the visit feel cozy.
El servicio espectacular el sabor divino

I had an amazing experience here! The drinks were refreshing, the waffle was perfectly crispy and delicious, and the pistachio crepe was out of this world! Everything was fresh and full of flavor. The staff was super friendly, and the vibe was lovely. Definitely one of my favorite spots in Bora Bora ‚Äî highly recommend!ü§ò

This is a cute spot! The interior is nice, everything looks clean, and the food tastes good and fresh. Everything was good, the only thing I would say is that some things were a bit too sweet (the acai bowl and the matcha smoothie) but I do plan to come back! I enjoyed my time here.
Great looking spot, amazing smoothies!

If you‚Äôre a dessert enthusiast like me, Bora Bora is an absolute dream come true. From the moment I walked in, I was blown away by the sweet aromas and the vibrant, welcoming atmosphere. But let me get straight to the point: the waffles are hands down the best I‚Äôve ever had.

Golden, crispy on the outside, soft and fluffy on the inside, and topped with just the right amount of syrup, fruit, or chocolate‚Äîwhatever your heart desires. It‚Äôs not just a waffle; it‚Äôs an experience. Every bite feels like pure happiness.

The rest of the menu? Also amazing. From gourmet pastries to creative dessert platters and specialty drinks, there‚Äôs something for every kind of sweet tooth. You can tell everything is made with care and creativity.

If you‚Äôre in town or even thinking about where to go next, do yourself a favor and come to Bora Bora. Whether you‚Äôre a foodie or just someone who enjoys a really good treat, this place will blow your mind. Trust me‚Äîyou haven‚Äôt truly lived until you‚Äôve tried their waffles.

Found this place on Uber eats. Bowl Taste is amazing! I have tried a few bowls with Nutella üòã. My friend tried the smoothie and she said it was good. Decided to visit the place instead of ordering online.  Wow ü§© decor and ambiance is really nice! Love this place. Will continue to visit.

The front cashier was very pleasant! Very professional and kind. The service was great , the restaurant was clean and very well designed. I hope you keep up the appearance :). My bowl was sooooo good ! I will be back.

Omg!! I love this place! The coconut bowls are absolutely amazing! I got the Cocotella & loved it. The coconut base has a great texture & flavor & the fruit and Nutella really made for a delicious combination. I‚Äôll definitely try more bowls from them soon! Also, I went bank the next day and tried the coffee. I had a large iced coffee with oat milk. I was going to go back and ask for more oat milk, but actually ended up drinking it dark because the flavor was so rich and bold. Great coffee!! You don‚Äôt even need much else in it! Also, the staff was very friendly & helpful üòä

WOW! What a fun smoothie cafe. It is fresh and clean and has a nice vibe. The drinks were spot on (we had berryliciois and dragon) and the pistachio crepe was delicious.
Plenty of comfortable seating for small or large groups. We didn‚Äôt feel rushed at all. Had our drinks and hung out for a while.
This will definitely become a go to place for me and my friends

Beautiful place with great ambience serving healthy juices, smoothies, acai bowls, pastries, coffee and much more. This place has good music going on all the time as well. A great option to bring your friends and family to hang out.

This restaurant is freaking amazing üëè ü§© üòç. Great location. Clean. Great quality. The dubai chocolate üç´ is superb. The Pistachio everything is amazing. So many different foods n drinks. It's beautiful inside too. Mohammad and the entire staff went above and beyond for us and every single customer. They made a friend and customer for life. For a full review please check Annastravelsnyc on Instagram & Tiktok & YouTube. This was spontaneous and wasn't sponsored. Thanks for a fantastic experience with great food and coffee ‚òïÔ∏è.  BTW you can order healthy too. They have protein in smoothies if you ask. Such a great diverse menu.

A new big sweet shop in the neighborhood that serves smoothies and variety of waffles and crepes. Their signature crepe is good, but a little pricy. I tried almond croissant and coffee which were good. Overall all, the place has plenty of seatings and offers a lot of sweets and smoothies, but a little pricy.
Customer service was amazing, I had a smoked salmon croffle, it was delicious, and my husband and I had brown sugar oat latte! We were treated with kindness and great hospitality.

Visited the new Bora Bora location in the Bronx during their grand opening and it was a great turn out. They offered free drinks, smoothies and food during their grand opening day and it took about 5 mins to receive the goodies. Shoutout to all the workers who helped contribute to a successful opening and making sure the customers left satisfied. The opening attracted a large crowd ranging from babies to elders and with all the anticipated traffic, they made sure everyone was served and satisfied. Thank-you for bringing Bora Bora to the Bronx and looking forward to more business owners opening businesses in the Bronx.

I had high hopes for the Dubai chocolate Cup, which is what I went for, but I didn‚Äôt like that Dubai chocolate cups are premade. I can taste that the strawberries were not freshly cut, and the chocolate was not freshly poured, and some of the strawberries were old and mushy. They need to make these fresh for the $15 we pay for.

We tried dubai chocolate crepe last time it was Amazing ! No comment
I tried it today, the taste is different more kunafa less pistachio and less chocolate üëéüèªüëéüèª‚Ä¶
The spot is very chill. We tried drinks, milkshakes, and croffles. Everything was delicious. Service is good as well.

Atmosphere is A1, a nice mixture of sweet with healthy choices, and the taste of fresh ingredients is sure to be worth the price. I totally recommend this place. They open for early breakfast and stay open for the vampires.

The Boraklyn A√ßa√≠ bowl was good‚Äîgreat fruity flavors and a decent-sized portion. On the other hand, the salmon croffle looked bigger and better in the menu photo than in reality. I probably won‚Äôt get that again, but I‚Äôm open to trying another a√ßa√≠ bowl or a milkshake next time.
Amazing smoothie shop. You definitely have to try the famous Dubai chocolate cup. I will definitely be back.
This place has potential but very slow service. They had 3 workers and, as you can see in the pictures, there were no clients. I waited over 15 mins for a smoothie I never received.

Wow, this place literally made me feel proud of my old stomping grounds. I‚Äôm glad the Bronx has their own location now. They knocked it out the park with this one! Their a√ßa√≠ bowls are amazing. I had the Boratella bowl, which has a few of my favorites: granola, peanut butter, banana, strawberry and nutella with little cocoa nibs. That‚Äôs actually my favorite so if you‚Äôre having a hard time choosing which one, pick that one! The pricing here is very fair. The decor is beautiful from the floors to the ceiling. I love their teal couches and the lamps that hang. And can‚Äôt forget the grass on the ceiling! With the yellow flowers. I will definitely come back and recommend anyone I know to this location! The staff were really pleasant and very attentive. You walk in and leave feeling like a valued customer! This place is nothing short of a 5 star review!

I took my daughter to try this spot out for the first time. I must admit it wasn‚Äôt something I regretted. She tried the Maldives fruit smoothie. The presentation and freshness was phenomenal. Great staff and overall vibe is on point especially for it being in the Bronx. The spot looks like a diamond in the rust where it‚Äôs located. They just opened up 6 months ago and hopefully it will be a staple there.  It will most definitely be a regular for me.
Had a wonderful experience today absolutely loved the  a√ßai bowls and Matcha !! Definitely recommend 10/10

Was my first time coming here and not my last time definitely. As soon as I entered I was greeted with amazing staff as well as the store was kept very clean and smelled good and design was fabulous. Food was 10/10‚Ä¶. Would highly recommend this place to anyone with a sweet tooth or in general it really suits anyone food craving.:)

Ordered 2 acai bowls, a pink freez (pictures below),a dubai chocolate bar and a strawberry cream cheese croffle.

I was so excited to find out this place opened.The menu and the prices are very reasonable.The customer service is Fantastic‚ÄºÔ∏èwas also given samples since I was so Indecisive.Please visit this Bora Bora location;you will not be disappointed üôÇüôÇ
this is the spot right here. i love coming here. they give great service and everything is so gooood ‚ò∫Ô∏è
The green juice, mango smoothie, and food were great. It's a beautiful restaurant with nice vibes. Mohammed was kind and friendly - highly recommend!
Went in with family. Got crepe, crofdle and numerous drinks. Everything was good and there is ample seating for the whole family.

mohammed was very nice & friendly.
this is my second time trying this place and it did not disappoint. food is great ! definitely recommend !
Really enjoyed the vibe and the food was amazing! Will be back soon!
Oh my goodness I love the Dubai chocolate strawberry cup. They are delicious. After trying from so many different places this is one of the best place I have ever found.
